text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe How is that $24,000 x 2 fridge and $100,000,000.00 worth of ice cream doing? So nice of you to show America how the top 1% live. Job losses caused by the Great Recession 8.8million. Job losses from Coronavirus as of today 4/23/2020 26 million+...
